text:
If a test class is not in any package / the top package the output does not show
the package name, making it "hard" to view the results for the classes in that
package. The patch takes care that the right path is set in the reference and
that some text is displayed (<none>) for the package name.
creator: jkf@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 7534
patch to the junit-no-frames.xsl to display <none> and refer to the right file for the "root" package.
creator: jkf@apache.org
